data: 1- No CPR, Supportive Care, No Intubation
5- No CPR, Critical Care, May Intunbate
Use thrombocytopenic precautions such as soft toothbrush and electric razor only
1 application, topical, PRN Other (see comment), Apply to lips. Leave at bedside
15 mL, swish and spit, BID, After breakfast and at bedtime
PLACEHOLDER: sodium chloride 0.9% 20 mL flush BID

Contraindications:
- No enemas, suppositories, IM injections, ASA or non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs)
- heparin flush for heparin induced thrombocytopenic syndrome (HITS)
